mapper.sql: ID, APP_CODE, APP_NAME, APP_URL, NAME_KEY, PASS_KEY, SSO_ACTION, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, DELETED, DESCRIPTION, IS_SHOW, SORT
mapper.insert: insert into app_app_info (APP_CODE, APP_NAME, APP_URL, NAME_KEY, PASS_KEY, SSO_ACTION, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, DELETED, DESCRIPTION, IS_SHOW, SORT) values ( #{appCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nameKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssoAction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(), #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isShow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update app_app_info set APP_CODE = #{appCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_NAME = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_URL = #{appUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME_KEY = #{nameKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASS_KEY = #{passKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSO_ACTION = #{ssoAction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=DATE}, DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_SHOW = #{isShow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(*) FROM app_app_info where deleted='N'
select distinct a.* from app_app_info a left join urp_permission ps on a.ID=ps.app_id where a.deleted='N' and ps.deleted='N'
select t.* from app_app_info t where t.deleted='N' and t.isShow='0' order by t.sort asc
select t.* from app_app_info t where t.app_code=#{appCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
